diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient has a long history of smoking (over 25 years) with significant nicotine dependence, evidenced by her high consumption (1-2 packs/day), difficulty in quitting, and reliance on cigarettes as a coping mechanism for stress and emotional issues. She has attempted various cessation methods without long-term success and expresses a desire to quit, compounded by her chronic health issues, including type 1 diabetes mellitus.
